channel.title: Changin exp rate
channel.description: Can some one tell what do i need to find and edit to change the exp rate on combat skills and noncombat skills....I see a post like this but can't find one that have been answered. Thank you

item.title: Changin exp rate
item.dc:creator: @Owner-Fugh Owner-Fugh
item.description:
@Owner-Fugh wrote:

Alright, sorry to say to everyone else here but this is how it goes. Go into Client.java And Do ‘Ctrl’ and ‘F’ And a locater will be found. After in what you want to find will be called ‘Accurate.’ Now, After finding it, Click next a few times, until you see something like this.

::

inCombat();
if (FightType == 1) // Accurate
{
TotalExp = (double) (# * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerAttack);
} else if (FightType == 2) // Agressive
{
TotalExp = (double) (# * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);
} else if (FightType == 4) // Defensive
{
TotalExp = (double) (# * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerDefence);
} else if (FightType == 3) // Controlled
{
TotalExp = (double) (# * hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double) (TotalExp * CombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int) (TotalExp), playerStrength);

Now, That is what you want.

When you see your number, in this case the '#'s That is what you want to change your EXP to. Say the “#” is at 700EXP each Hit. Change it to 1000EXP each hit.

NOTE: WARNING:: YOUR SERVER MAY NOT BE THE SAME AS MINE, I’M SHOWING YOU THE WAY I KNOW.

This was from my [Tut] but it was under 5 Minutes, so it got deleted.

Read full topic

item.title: Changin exp rate
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

The combat skill experience can be changed in the Attack & AttackNPC methods, the other skills vary on the source you’re using.

Read full topic
